title: Spartan反作弊装上之后玩家无法正常移动
author: lao_liu_
txt_content: Spartan反作弊安装之后玩家无法移动OP也是他提示的IrregularMovements我关了还是不行。求解

replies.author: 诺尘_
replies.txt_content:
Incompatible Features: [size=14.6667px](May work correctly in many cases)[size=14.6667px]Irregular higher-TPS clients. (Badlion client)
[size=14.6667px]Plugins that create client-sided blocks. (BlockChange Packets)
[size=14.6667px]Plugins that change combat, movement, build or other vanilla events. (Abilities)
[size=14.6667px]Plugins/Mods that affect block interaction out of a player's line of sight.
[size=14.6667px]Non-vanilla/Unknown Minecraft enchantments.
[size=14.6667px]Item Attributes. (Arbitrary bonuses on armor and weaponry)
上文提到了改变移动的插件是不太兼容的，是否有这种插件？

replies.author: lao_liu_
replies.txt_content:
诺尘_ 发表于 2018-4-9 07:56
Incompatible Features: (May work correctly in many cases)Irregular higher-TPS clients.[/ ...
没有啊。。。
